生物标志物测试可以改善早产的新生儿结果早产 - 定义为怀孕第37周之前的分娩 - 是美国婴儿死亡的主要原因之一。过早出生的婴儿也有严重健康问题的风险。 https://www.news-medical.net/news/20250203/biomarker-test-can-improve-neonatal-unatal-comes-for-preterm-births.aspx https://www.news-medical.net/news/20250203/biomarker-test-can-improve-neonatal-comes-for-preterm-births.aspx#comment https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=4b1ba1d9-7747-4107-4107-8D90-53AFB175C334 Mon, 03 Feb 2025 08:06:34 -0500 Biomarker test can improve neonatal outcomes for preterm births
